definition: to receive/to accept/to collect/to put away/to restrain/to stop/in care of (used on address line after name)

sentences.english: Someone hefted the register back up to its place on the counter.
sentences.chinese: 有人拿起收银机，把它放回柜台原来的位置上。

sentences.english: Even when no one asked me to play cash register, what?
sentences.chinese: 连没人时都要我去打收银，什么？

sentences.english: There were only two tills open, while six others stood unattended.
sentences.chinese: 只有两个收银处开着，其他六个都空着没人值班。

sentences.english: A cashier can store cash register values pnly for himself for the day.
sentences.chinese: 收银员只能存储当天自己使用的收银机值。

sentences.english: A cashier can store cash register values pnly for himself for the day.
sentences.chinese: 收银员只能存储当天自己使用的收银机值。

sentences.english: The check out assistant at my usual supermarket is always rude and unhelpful.
sentences.chinese: 我经常去的超市的收银员总是很粗鲁而且没多大用处。

sentences.english: The sweet cashier then said, “I am a Christian.
sentences.chinese: 善良的收银员接着说道，“我是一个基督徒。

sentences.english: Please go to the cashier to pay for it.
I showed my phone to the cashier, who had been trained to enter the Groupon codes.
sentences.chinese: 我把手机给收银员看，他已经学会输入团扣网编码。

sentences.english: He takes a part-time job as a cashier.
sentences.chinese: 他利用工作的空馀时间兼差做收银员。

sentences.english: His eyes were fixed on the magazine rack next to the cash register.
sentences.chinese: 他的眼睛盯着收银台下的杂志架。

sentences.english: That blabbermouth that runs the cash register at the store?
sentences.chinese: 记得那商店收银的长舌妇吗？

sentences.english: The cashier checked out the groceries.
sentences.chinese: 收银员将杂货一一计价后收款。

sentences.english: Their big break came when they discovered a trail of white register tape.
sentences.chinese: 案件的重大转机出现在他们发现了一溜白色收银发票。

sentences.english: Safe Deposit Boxes are available at your room and Cashiers Desk.
sentences.chinese: 客房内和前台收银处均备有免费使用之保险箱。

definition: to pay the bill/to settle accounts/also written 結帳|结帐
(at a restaurant) to order a meal/(of a waiter) to take an order
stage/proscenium/foreground in politics etc (sometimes derog.)/front desk/reception desk/(computing) front-end/foreground
to pay the bill/to settle accounts/also written 結賬|结账
variant of 櫃檯|柜台[gui4 tai2]
sales counter/front desk/bar/(of markets, medicines etc) OTC (over-the-counter)
variant of 櫃檯|柜台[gui4 tai2]
